title: 820-00045 -  Video glitches - RIP CPU?
message:
sometimes good and most time the video becomes bad whenever I try to load OSX.

when the video becomes pixelated and freezes, then I have to press and hold the power button to switch it off but it won't power up again with the keyboard unless I press the battery button several times.

title: 820-00045 -  Video glitches - RIP CPU?
message: Does it do it externally as well? If so, likely failing CPU/cracked traces under RAM. Time waster sadly

title: 820-00045 -  Video glitches - RIP CPU?
message: won't let me connect externally even with the lcd disconnected. my known working board works externally.

title: 820-00045 -  Video glitches - RIP CPU?
message: Yeah that sounds screwed to me.

title: 820-00045 -  Video glitches - RIP CPU?
message: That's one for the junk bin I'd say.
